Golf
lead_paragraph: Public relations experts believe that the longer Tiger Woods waits to address the news media about his Friday morning car crash, the greater the possibility that his reputation could suffer.
snippet: Public relations experts believe that the longer Tiger Woods waits to address the news media about his Friday morning car crash, the greater the possibility that his reputation could suffer.
